Create covariate data for Stan input

Source: R/components.R
stan_data_covariates.Rd

Creates the following Stan data input list fields:

  • num_cov_cat

  • num_cov_cont

  • x_cat

  • x_cat_num_levels

  • x_cont

  • x_cont_unnorm

  • x_cont_mask

stan_data_covariates(data, x_names, x_cont_scl)

Arguments

data

a data frame
x_names

unique covariate names
x_cont_scl

Information on how to scale the continuous covariates. This can either be

  • an existing list of objects with class lgpscaling, or

  • NA, in which case such list is created by computing mean and standard deviation from data

Value

a named list with fields

  • to_stan: a list of stan data

  • x_cont_scaling: normalization function and inverse for each continuous covariate

  • x_cat_levels: names of the levels of each categorical covariate before conversion from factor to numeric
